page.title: 12EVENTS IN NORTH HOLMWOOD
page.content: THE BONFIRE FAIR: The Bonfire Fair is held on the Saturday after November 5th on North Holmwood village green. Bensons,the fair owners based near by, provide fun rides and stalls. Fireworks are provided by the local newsagent/post office. Children light the bonfire with torches. It is supervised by Mr.Piper and the local National Trust. It is a very popular event. THE MAY FAYRE: The may fayre is held on Goodwyns School field and organised by the First School (Ages 5_8 years). There are competitions, Pony Rides,various stalls and usually a raffle. One of the children is crowned as "May Queen" and leads the parade which opens the fayre.
